bug_report.summary: When you click on the 'A to Z' filtering button on the main page of the application, chaotic filtering of lists occurs
bug_report.step_to_reproduce: <1> Open Govar application </1> <2> Create 15 lists that will start respectively (A, a, D, 3, :, U, u, SH, SH, 5, @, Ї, ї, -, d) </2> <3> Click on the 'A to Z' filter button on the main page of the application </3>
bug_report.expected_result: <1> Lists are sorted in order: symbols, numbers, Latin letters (upper case first), Cyrillic letters (upper case first)</1> <2> Correct order : (-, :, @, 3, 5, A, a, D, d, U, u, Ї, ї, W, w) </2>
bug_report.author: Alona Bohdanets
